name: A Tower (romcodes)
description:
This is the first game we have ever "finished".

We worked on it during the 5 days of the Global Game Jam 2021 and had a lot of fun. We kept working on it from time to time to fix bugs and give it the ending we wanted, it's not done yet, but someday it will be.

We are happy about it for our first project even thought it didn't achieve our ambitious goals.

Known Issues:

* No ending

* Sometimes the forest challenge cannot be completed

ChangeLog:

0.18

* Adds Main Menu when game opens

0.16

* Fixes missing light issues
* Adjust transporter triggers to avoid players walking all the way to the challenges
* Enables V-sync (not having vsync on was causing issues for streamers)

source code available at: https://github.com/romulobr/ggj2021game

The game was made by 3 people: Wyano (Art), Romulo (Code) and Ednar (Music and Audio)
